languages.text: "А, сообразил{mf||а}, о ком речь, да?" {n}Маражай осклабляется, но его улыбка тут же тает.{/n} "Твари не угомонились после своего фиаско в шпиле Опустошительной бури. Они хотят моей крови и боли, потому решили наведаться на твою посудину и попытаться застать меня врасплох. Напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "А, сообразил{mf||а}, о ком речь, да?" {n}Маражай осклабляется, но его улыбка тут же тает.{/n} "Твари не угомонились после своего фиаско в шпиле Опустошительной бури. Они хотят моей крови и боли, потому решили наведаться на твою посудину и попытаться застать меня врасплох. Напрасно".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."
languages.original_text: "А, сообразил{mf||а}, о ком речь, да?" {n}Маражай осклабляется, но его улыбка тут же тает.{/n} "Твари не угомонились после своего фиаско в шпиле Опустошительной бури. Они хотят моей крови и боли, потому решили наведаться на твою посудину и попытаться застать меня врасплох. Напрасно".

They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, has descubierto de quién es obra, ¿verdad?». {n}Marazhai sonríe, burlón, pero la expresión desaparece al momento.{/n} «Las bestias no se han tranquilizado tras el fiasco de la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Quieren mi sangre y mi dolor, y por eso han venido a tu barcaza a intentar atraparme por sorpresa. Han fallado».
languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, has descubierto de quién es obra, ¿verdad?». {n}Marazhai sonríe, burlón, pero la expresión desaparece al momento.{/n} «Las bestias no se han tranquilizado tras el fiasco de la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Quieren mi sangre y mi dolor, y por eso han venido a tu barcaza a intentar atraparme por sorpresa. Han fallado».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “啊，你已经弄清楚是谁干的了，是吧？”{n}玛拉斋得意地笑了笑，但得意之色很快就消失了。{/n}“那群怪物在狂风阴谋团的尖塔上惨败之后，依然没有放弃。他们打算品尝我的鲜血与痛苦，于是他们来到了你的船上，打算出其不意地袭击我，但他们失败了。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

traits.locale_text: “啊，你已经弄清楚是谁干的了，是吧？”{n}玛拉斋得意地笑了笑，但得意之色很快就消失了。{/n}“那群怪物在狂风阴谋团的尖塔上惨败之后，依然没有放弃。他们打算品尝我的鲜血与痛苦，于是他们来到了你的船上，打算出其不意地袭击我，但他们失败了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、誰だか分かったんだな？」{n}マラズハイはニヤニヤ笑ったが、すぐに顔から表情が消えた。{/n}「略奪の嵐の尖塔でしくじって以降、獣どもが落ち着かないんだ。やつらは俺の血と苦痛が欲しいのさ。だからお前の船にやって来て、俺の不意を突いて襲おうとしたんだ。まぁ、失敗に終わったがな」
languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、誰だか分かったんだな？」{n}マラズハイはニヤニヤ笑ったが、すぐに顔から表情が消えた。{/n}「略奪の嵐の尖塔でしくじって以降、獣どもが落ち着かないんだ。やつらは俺の血と苦痛が欲しいのさ。だからお前の船にやって来て、俺の不意を突いて襲おうとしたんだ。まぁ、失敗に終わったがな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, vous avez deviné de qui il s'agissait, à ce que je vois. » {n}Marazhai esquisse un vague rictus qui s'efface aussitôt.{/n} « Ces sales bêtes ne décolèrent pas depuis le fiasco survenu dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse. Elles veulent me saigner et me faire souffrir, raison pour laquelle elles ont décidé de s'introduire sur votre vaisseau afin de me prendre au dépourvu. Peine perdue. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, vous avez deviné de qui il s'agissait, à ce que je vois. » {n}Marazhai esquisse un vague rictus qui s'efface aussitôt.{/n} « Ces sales bêtes ne décolèrent pas depuis le fiasco survenu dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse. Elles veulent me saigner et me faire souffrir, raison pour laquelle elles ont décidé de s'introduire sur votre vaisseau afin de me prendre au dépourvu. Peine perdue. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, Ihr habt also herausgefunden, wer es war?" {n}Marazhai grinst, doch der Ausdruck verschwindet sofort wieder von seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Die Bestien haben sich nach dem Fiasko auf dem Turm des plündernden Sturms noch nicht wieder beruhigt. Sie wollen mein Blut und meine Schmerzen, daher sind sie zu Eurem Kübel gekommen, um mich zu überrumpeln. Sie sind gescheitert."
languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Ihr habt also herausgefunden, wer es war?" {n}Marazhai grinst, doch der Ausdruck verschwindet sofort wieder von seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Die Bestien haben sich nach dem Fiasko auf dem Turm des plündernden Sturms noch nicht wieder beruhigt. Sie wollen mein Blut und meine Schmerzen, daher sind sie zu Eurem Kübel gekommen, um mich zu überrumpeln. Sie sind gescheitert."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

languages.text: "Ya... Sen de çözdün, değil mi?" {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor ama yüz ifadesi anında değişiyor.{/n} "Müfteris Kasırga kulesindeki fiyaskonun ardından bir durulmadılar gitti. Kanımı istiyorlar, acı çektirmek istiyorlar. O yüzden gemine gelip beni kıstırmaya kalktılar... Beceremediler."
languages.original_text: "Ah, you worked out who it was, did you?" {n}Marazhai smirks, but the expression immediately falls from his face.{/n} "The beasts have not settled down after the fiasco in the Reaving Tempest's spire. They want my blood and pain, which is why they decided to come to your barge and try to take me by surprise. They failed."

traits.locale_text: "Hee... Sen de çözdün, değil mi?" {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor ama yüz ifadesi anında değişiyor.{/n} "Müfteris Kasırga kulesindeki fiyaskonun ardından bir durulmadılar, gitti. Kanımı istiyorlar, acı çektirmek istiyorlar. O yüzden gemine gelip beni kıstırmaya kalktılar... Yapamadılar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
